author: dapplion
content:
Last minute simplification for deneb suggested by <@520034910149410861> , please consensus devs take a look async before ACDC https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3531
 
In summary, attach the block header and an inclusion proof on each blob sidecar.

- BlobSidecars now inherit slashing guarantees of block equivocations without adding new slashing conditions.
- Validators do not need to sign additional messages
- p2p validator is cheaper since 1 single signature has to be validated for each block + blobs set
